greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Indicator sequence for the Fibonacci numbers.
comment: The number of nonnegative integer solutions of x^4 - 10*n^2*x^2 + 25*n^4 - 16 = 0. - _Hieronymus Fischer_, May 17 2007
formula: a(n) = 1+floor(arcsinh(sqrt(5)*n/2)/log(phi))-ceiling(arccosh(sqrt(5)*n/2)/log(phi)), for n>0, where phi=(1+sqrt(5))/2. Also true: a(n)=A108852(n)-A108852(n-1)=A130233(n)-A130233(n-1)=1+A130233(n)-A130234(n) for n>0 and a(n)=A130234(n+1)-A130234(n) for n>=0. - _Hieronymus Fischer_, May 17 2007
program: (PARI) a(n)=if(k==1,return(2)); my(k=n^2);k+=((k + 1) << 2);issquare(k) || issquare(k-8) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Feb 03 2014
xref: Partial sums are in A108852. See also A130233 and A130234.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Apr 01 2005
